subtotal.reason: The totals area shows 'SUBTOTAL' with printed value '$400'; currency symbol retained in value and numeric normalized to 400.0.

tax_rate.reason: Totals block shows 'Tax 10%'; captured percent string and normalized to numeric percentage 10.0.

tax_amount.reason: An explicit monetary tax amount is not printed in the totals area (only the percentage is shown). Although taxable amount can be calculated (400 * 10% = 40), no explicit tax monetary value is printed so field set to null per 'do not invent' rule.

total.reason: Totals area shows 'TOTAL' with printed value '$440'. Normalized numeric value is 440.0.

currency.reason: Monetary values on the document use the dollar sign '$'. Normalized to common currency code 'USD'.

Line-separated table of items with headers DESCRIPTION / UNIT PRICE / QTY / TOTAL and simple totals block at bottom-right.
